name: PLMplus
tag_list: plm, qms, product-lifecycle-management, pdm, product-data-management, bpm, engineering
description: Product Life Cycle Management On Demand
overview:
PLM+, Simplified PLM, On Demand.

PLM+ was founded in 2008 with the vision of helping small and medium sized companies build better products.

PLM+ provides a solution for Product Lifecycle and Quality Management delivered in an on demand model. PLM+ is the only solution that provides small & medium companies with the ability to start with a small and simple system implementation and grow only according to their needs. PLM+ combines on demand technology together with a rich user experience to provide customers with a system that requires no implementation or training in order to get going and provide immediate benefits.

PLM+ is backed by the leading venture capital firms Hasso Plattner Ventures and Cedar Fund.
